fr.polytech.projectjava.mainapp.company.departments

Class Department<B extends Person & java.io.Serializable,E extends Employee & java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.polytech.projectjava.mainapp.company.departments.Department<B,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManagementDepartment, StandardDepartment

    public abstract class Department<B extends Person & java.io.Serializable,E extends Employee & java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent a department
